title: The House on Badger Lane
description: In this Dateline classic, the three young children of a couple who live in a gated community in California hear a thump one morning that becomes the first clue in a mystery that will expose family secrets. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on January 31, 2016.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
